message.content:
Edit the file `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/.github/workflows/backend.yml`.

Append a second job called `ktlint-format` after the existing `build-and-test` job. The final file must look exactly like this:

```yaml
name: Backend CI

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - backend/**
      - shared-dto/**
      - gradle/**
      - '*.gradle.kts'
      - gradle.properties
      - .github/workflows/backend.yml
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - backend/**
      - shared-dto/**
      - gradle/**
      - '*.gradle.kts'
      - gradle.properties
      - .github/workflows/backend.yml

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '21'
          distribution: 'temurin'
      - uses: gradle/actions/setup-gradle@v4
      - name: Build
        run: ./gradlew :shared-dto:build :backend:build -x test
      - name: Test
        run: ./gradlew :backend:test

  ktlint-format:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          ref: ${{ github.head_ref || github.ref_name }}
          token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      - uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '21'
          distribution: 'temurin'
      - uses: gradle/actions/setup-gradle@v4
      - name: Format
        run: ./gradlew ktlintFormat
      - name: Commit and push
        run: |
          git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git config user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          if ! git diff --quiet; then
            git add -A
            git commit -m "style: apply ktlintFormat"
            git push
          fi
```

Write this exact content to the file. Nothing else.

name: Backend CI

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - backend/**
      - shared-dto/**
      - gradle/**
      - '*.gradle.kts'
      - gradle.properties
      - .github/workflows/backend.yml
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - backend/**
      - shared-dto/**
      - gradle/**
      - '*.gradle.kts'
      - gradle.properties
      - .github/workflows/backend.yml

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '21'
          distribution: 'temurin'
      - uses: gradle/actions/setup-gradle@v4
      - name: Build
        run: ./gradlew :shared-dto:build :backend:build -x test
      - name: Test
        run: ./gradlew :backend:test

  ktlint-format:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          ref: ${{ github.head_ref || github.ref_name }}
          token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      - uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '21'
          distribution: 'temurin'
      - uses: gradle/actions/setup-gradle@v4
      - name: Format
        run: ./gradlew ktlintFormat
      - name: Commit and push
        run: |
          git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git config user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          if ! git diff --quiet; then
            git add -A
            git commit -m "style: apply ktlintFormat"
            git push
          fi
